description_txt: stated on January 30, 2018 in a post on Rep. Mullin's Facebook page:
quote_txt: Under President Barack Obama: 4 million jobs lost, unemployment rose from 7.8% to 9.9%, the S&P 500 was 1,115.1 and the GDP went down 2.8%.

description_txt: stated on January 26, 2018 in a speech in Davos, Switzerland:
quote_txt: "Consumer confidence, business confidence, and manufacturing confidence are the highest they have been in many decades."

description_txt: stated on January 29, 2018 in a session with Chicago Tribune editorial board:
quote_txt: "I have introduced balanced budgets every year that I’ve been governor."

description_txt: stated on January 12, 2018 in an interview:
quote_txt: About 1.1 million people legally enter the U.S. each year as permanent residents -- "65 percent of that is some kind of chain migration; 22 percent is diversity lottery, ‘asyling,’ refugees; only about 14, 15 percent has anything to do with work."

description_txt: stated on February 1, 2018 in a Tweet:
quote_txt: "45.6 million people watched (the State of the Union), the highest number in history. @FoxNews beat every other Network, for the first time ever, with 11.7 million people tuning in."

description_txt: stated on January 22, 2018 in a news story:
quote_txt: "Texas is home to more feral pigs than any other state — an estimated 50 percent to 75 percent of all feral swine in the nation."

description_txt: stated on January 30, 2018 in a headline:
quote_txt: Democrats "booed families of children murdered by MS13."

description_txt: stated on January 30, 2018 in a headline:
quote_txt: "Rep. Paul Gosar asks Capitol Police to arrest illegal immigrants attending State of the Union."

description_txt: stated on January 30, 2018 in a headline:
quote_txt: "Fall River, Massachusetts was not 'built by immigrants.' "

description_txt: stated on January 23, 2018 in a press conference:
quote_txt: "New York consistently ranks as one of the worst voting turnout states in the nation."

description_txt: stated on January 17, 2018 in a press conference:
quote_txt: "New York has the third lowest rate of gun-caused death in America."

description_txt: stated on January 18, 2018 in a radio interview:
quote_txt: "70 percent of the income tax that the state collects happens to come from Westchester, Nassau, Suffolk and New York City"

description_txt: stated on January 20, 2018 in an interview:
quote_txt: "We have the highest graduation rate of basketball players in the history of the NCAA. We have the highest graduation rate of African-American basketball players in the history of the NCAA in basketball."

description_txt: stated on January 25, 2018 in a speech on the House floor:
quote_txt: "There were slaves in 1845 who helped construct and build the Old Capitol."

description_txt: stated on January 30, 2018 in the 2018 State of the Union address:
quote_txt: "Apple has just announced it plans to invest a total of $350 billion in America, and hire another 20,000 workers."

description_txt: stated on January 31, 2018 in State of the Union address:
quote_txt: "A single immigrant can bring in unlimited numbers of distant relatives."

description_txt: stated on January 11, 2018 in a tweet:
quote_txt: Says Paul Soglin took Madison backward -- "businesses have left and murders have gone up."

description_txt: stated on January 30, 2018 in response to State of the Union address:
quote_txt: "Top CEOs (are) making 300 times the average worker."

description_txt: stated on January 30, 2018 in the 2018 State of the Union address:
quote_txt: "In the past, we have foolishly released hundreds and hundreds of dangerous terrorists, only to meet them again on the battlefield — including the ISIS leader, al-Baghdadi, who we captured, who we had, who we released."

description_txt: stated on January 30, 2018 in the 2018 State of the Union address:
quote_txt: "We are now, very proudly, an exporter of energy to the world."

description_txt: stated on January 30, 2018 in the 2018 State of the Union address:
quote_txt: Says one year later, "the coalition to defeat ISIS has liberated very close to 100 percent of the territory just recently held by these killers in Iraq and Syria."

description_txt: stated on January 30, 2018 in his State of the Union address:
quote_txt: "Small business confidence is at an all-time high."

description_txt: stated on January 30, 2018 in the State of the Union address:
quote_txt: "America is a nation of builders. We built the Empire State Building in just one year. Isn’t it a disgrace that it can now take 10 years just to get a minor permit approved for the building of a simple road?"

description_txt: stated on January 30, 2018 in his State of the Union address:
quote_txt: "After years of wage stagnation, we are finally seeing rising wages."

description_txt: stated on January 30, 2018 in State of the Union address:
quote_txt: The immigration visa lottery "randomly hands out green cards without any regard for skill, merit, or the safety of American people."

description_txt: stated on January 30, 2018 in the State of the Union speech:
quote_txt: "Since we passed tax cuts, over 3 million workers have gotten tax cut bonuses — many of them thousands and thousands of dollars."

description_txt: stated on January 30, 2018 in his State of the Union address:
quote_txt: "We enacted the biggest tax cuts and reforms in American history."

description_txt: stated on January 28, 2018 in a tweet:
quote_txt: "Because of my policies, Black Unemployment has just been reported to be at the LOWEST RATE EVER RECORDED!"

description_txt: stated on December 14, 2017 in a speech:
quote_txt: On taxes, "if you go back and look 50 years ago, individuals paid about 7 percent of the total and corporations paid 5 percent. Fast forward 50 years: individuals still 7 percent, corporations (are) down to 2 percent."

description_txt: stated on January 29, 2018 in a session with Chicago Tribune editorial board:
quote_txt: "No private business was conducted on public property. That issue is a contract dispute."
